data.about: I have been working as a software engineer for one year, and I have completed comparable internships during my college years. I have an unrivaled love for learning new development tools, and I find algorithms and data structures to be very compelling when it comes to addressing problems. I'm currently developing my knowledge of GraphQL while honing my backend and frontend abilities.

experiences.description:
Project- MTN: Working on Angular and implementing Angular features like-
State Management (NgRx), Authentication, Lazy Loading, Reactive Forms, and Optimizing Angular performance and Testing using Jasmine and Karma.
• Worked on creating a digital, paperless onboarding platform to cut the time required to onboard a partner by up to 80%.
• Developed a role-based access gateway to enhance the use of paperless onboarding.
• Worked on whole frontend flow from creating UI to integrating API.
• Worked together to create fallout emails to aid other squad members.
• Learned how to communicate with clients and work with various teams to produce results using Agile methodology.
experiences.title: Application Developer

experiences.description:
I was a Front End Developer. Trained in modern front-end technologies such as
HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Typescript, and Angular. Worked on a hiring management software built with the MEAN stack and the IBM Cloud.
• Developed a support page and feedback-ready chatbot. which contributed to a 70% increase in app usage.
• Developed endpoints to enable various app functionality.
• Worked on designing APIs and integrating them to construct the entire product flow, from the user interface to the backend.
experiences.title: Developer intern

experiences.description:
Worked on different technologies to build AI B2B Invoice management system. Trained ML Model on 50K
raw records using Feature engineering. Made a WebApp to predict the Clear Date for given Data.
Worked on Java based Frameworks, Sql and Ext.js and applied MVC Pattern to develop features for the product.
experiences.title: Software Development Intern

experiences.description: Worked on frontend of a tours and travel website
experiences.title: Web Development Intern

experiences.description: Worked as a web development and design intern, out of several task I worked on payment gateway integration using PHP and integrated instamojo
experiences.title: Web Development Intern
